definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: This formula, however, doesn't work because women keep score differently.
sentences.chinese: 但是這個公式無效，因爲女人自有她不同的記分法。

sentences.english: Isn't there a problem in one of the players owning the scorecard that everybody uses?
sentences.chinese: 一位玩家持有衆人使用的記分卡，這難道沒有問題麼？

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the correlation of Ureaplasma urealyticum(Uu) and Chlamydia trachomatis(Ct) infections with male sterility.
sentences.chinese: 目的尋找診斷特發性男性不育的生物標記分子。

sentences.english: Remember, he's a Martian and doesn't keep score the way you do.
sentences.chinese: 謹記，他是火星人，記分法和你不同。

sentences.english: The VIP is shown on the scoreboard, for your team only.
sentences.chinese: 是的貴賓的記分牌上顯示，您的團隊只。

sentences.english: Here the scoreboard gets a bit better and better to see for all the fans.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，所有球迷觀看的記分牌會顯示得更清晰一些。

sentences.english: And then, this article introduces the case of BSC in Shanghai Quyang Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 還介紹了上海曲陽醫院實施平衡記分卡的案例。

sentences.english: Added avatar images to the scoreboards.
sentences.chinese: 在記分牌加頭像的圖像。

sentences.english: Sir, do you need tees, ball marker, score card and pencil?
sentences.chinese: 先生，你需要球座，球標，記分卡和筆嗎？

sentences.english: However, the marker also recorded a net 3 in the better-ball column.
sentences.chinese: 不過，記分員也在最佳杆數一欄記下了3杆。

sentences.english: This mystery can be understood when we realize how men and women keep score differently.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們知道男女不同的記分法，這個謎就解開了。

sentences.english: Changed so live players don't see enemy deaths in the scoreboard .
sentences.chinese: 生存的玩家不能在記分板上看到敵人死亡。

sentences.english: Congress has authorized the president to suspend the operation of a statute .
sentences.chinese: 教務會議已經通過了一項記分制度章程。

sentences.english: In this paper, the two methods of grading of marks are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹兩種相對記分法。

sentences.english: Zhou Lan glanced at the judges who were busy writing on their mark sheets.
sentences.chinese: 周蘭瞥了一眼忙着在記分冊上打分的裁判。

sentences.english: How do the judges score a bout?

definition: to substitute/to complement in the proper order/to fill vacancies progressively
to stipulate/to state expressly/to explicitly provide for

pinyin: Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3

definition: (international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
